Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for booking into our Gifted & Talented and Scholarship Information Evening at 5.30pm on Wednesday 8 May, 2019.
We will email you again one week prior to the event to remind you and provide further details.
In the meantime, if there's anything else we can help you with, please do not hesitate to contact us.
To keep up to date with what’s happening across our K-12 St Andrew’s community, visit our facebook page. It’s updated daily during term time with news, photos, events and mini videos.
Yours Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} Enrolments
